item.description:
For all the meet up members who do not wish to go swing dancing on Friday, April 15, but still looking for a really fun night- then check out the huge Mix and Mingle event just for Meet Up members at the Hard Rock Cafe. Organized by Biagio of Social Fun- this event will be a lot of fun and is free. There are 6 different groups participating!

 

PLEASE DO NOT DOUBLE, TRIPLE OR QUADRUPLE RSVP


The party will be inside the Cavern Club (it's on the right after you walk into the Hard Rock Café) we will get the following:

  1. From 6:30PM to 7:30PM (One free hour) of appetizers (chicken tupelo, spring rolls, haystack salads, pulled pork sandwich).  A good reason to get there early and enjoy some FREE FOOD WHILE IT LASTS.-------There will be a sign at the FOOD saying reserved for Social Fun.
  2. Free pool for three hours
  3. Reserved seating and live music
  4. Free cover to REWIRED (DJ dance night) from 10pm – 2am, Yes this is when the wild, fun and crazy dancing starts. Note they will start clearing out the table and chairs around 9PM to make room for the dancing!
  5. They will have $3 Sam Adams Seasonal Bottled Beer

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

DIRECTIONS

MBTA ACCESS:

Orange Line to Haymarket Station. Exit the station onto Congress Street. Take a left out of the station and walk along Congress Street. At North Street, take a left and continue until you reach Clinton Street where you will find the Hard Rock on the corner.

 

Green Line to Government Center Station. Exit the station and walk across the plaza then down the stairs to the right of City Hall. At the bottom of the stairs, you will see Quincy Market and Faneuil Hall. Cross Congress Street at the crosswalk and turn left. Take a right on North Street and walk until you get to Clinton Street. You will see the Hard Rock across from the Millenium Bostonian Hotel.

DRIVING:

From the West: Massachusetts Turnpike/I-90 E to exit 24 A-B-C on the left. Merge onto I-93 N/Rt-3 N toward Concord, NH. Take exit #23 for Government Center. Turn left at John F Fitzgerald Surface Road. Take a right on Clinton Street and the Hard Rock will be on your right.

 From the South & Logan Airport: Take Interstate I-93 North toward Boston/Rt-3 to exit #23 heading to Government Center. Turn left on John F. Fitzgerald Surface Road. Turn right on Clinton Street. The Hard Rock will be on your right.

 From the North: Take Interstate I-93 South to exit #24-A/Airport toward Government Center. Turn right onto Clinton Street. The Hard Rock will be on your right.

Parking Information: car: 
Validated Parking: Take advantage of a $3 discount at 75 State Street Garage www.75statestreetgarage.com. Just get your ticket validated at our host stand.  Additional parking garages and very limited on-street parking in the area.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Biagio inside the Cavern Club (on your right) inside Hard Rock.
item.why: It is time for another multi group mix and mingle- hosted by Biagio of Social Fun! Always a good time!
item.name: Mix and Mingle Free Joint Event at the Hard Rock Cafe
